metadata.name: CASTAWAY 2D #1
metadata.description:
Yong-yong looks inside himself through his daily routine. Yesterday and today, today and tomorrow are no different from each other, and it seems that you and I are no different. What is interesting is that Yong-yong's daily life and imagination within it are confined to the 'frame' of daily life and country, but he dreams of 'outside the frame' through the freedom that he unfolds with his countless imaginations and communication with others. Therefore, probable and desired aspects overlap at the same time.

#NFTart   #Daily routine
